links.title: Apple Now Faces Over 60 Class Actions Over iPhone Slowdowns, Consolidation Likely Next Month
links.description: Apple's legal battle against accusations that it intentionally slows down older iPhones to incentivize customers to upgrade to newer models will likely take place in one courtroom near the company's headquarters in California. The U.S.
